channel.title: Is Vista Ultimate Better than XP?
channel.description: I know Vista has alot of bugs, But ultimate dosent got that many bugs ( i think) Or should I stay with XP Pro.?

item.title: Is Vista Ultimate Better than XP?
item.dc:creator: @Kevin3654 Kevin3654
item.description:
@Kevin3654 wrote:

I would stick to XP Pro. or upgarde your XP for a better one.
